LANDING-PAGE.TITLE: Find resources to navigate the Belgian social system
LANDING-PAGE.GUIDANCE-TEXT: Here you can find lists of portals and websites from the Belgian social system organized in categories.

CONTACT-PAGE.TITLE: Do you have a question or maybe a suggestion about resources we could include?

ABOUT-PAGE.TITLE: Hi!
ABOUT-PAGE.GUIDANCE-TEXT-1: Not so long ago, I participate in the social orientation course provided by the Agentschap Integratie en Inburgering and found the content really useful! Our teacher Heidi, gave us a lot of interesting resources and information
ABOUT-PAGE.GUIDANCE-TEXT-2:
Talking with colleages and friends about it, I realise that this information could be useful not only for the new
      comers in Belgium but for everybody living here, so I decided to make this small website to put this information
      together, organized in categories.
ABOUT-PAGE.GUIDANCE-TEXT-3:
If you have any question or suggestion about a resource that could be added to the lists please semd me a message
      to <a href="mailto:info@information-belgium.com">info@information-belgium.com
